block.p: Mr. and Mrs. F. Stephen O'Brien of Potomac, Md., have announced the engagement of their daughter Jennifer Anne O'Brien to Myron Adam Brilliant, a son of Drs. Richard and Eleanor Brilliant of Scarsdale, N.Y. A November wedding is planned.

Ms. O'Brien is a graphic designer at Ogilvy Adams & Rinehart, a public relations concern in Washington. She graduated from the Parsons School of Design. Her father, an economist, is the resident representative of the World Bank in Nairobi, Kenya.

Mr. and Mrs. F. Stephen O'Brien of Potomac, Md., have announced the engagement of their daughter Jennifer Anne O'Brien to Myron Adam Brilliant, a son of Drs. Richard and Eleanor Brilliant of Scarsdale, N.Y. A November wedding is planned.

Ms. O'Brien is a graphic designer at Ogilvy Adams & Rinehart, a public relations concern in Washington. She graduated from the Parsons School of Design. Her father, an economist, is the resident representative of the World Bank in Nairobi, Kenya.

Mr. Brilliant is an associate in the Washington law firm of Stewart & Stewart. He graduated from the University of Maryland and received a law degree from the American University. His mother is an associate professor of social work at Rutgers University in New Brunswick, N.J. His father is the Anna S. Garbedian Professor in the Humanities at Columbia University and the editor of The Art Bulletin, a quarterly magazine.
